summary: A WHILE AGO I BRAKED OVER A MAN HOLE COVER AND THE ANTI LOCK BRAKES KICKED IN AND I ALMOST CRASHED INTO THE CAR IN FRONT OF ME.  EVER SINCE THIS HAPPENED THE BRAKES PUSH ABOUT 70% DOWN BEFORE ENGAGING. IT SEEMS SOMETHING HAS CHANGED WITH THE ABS SYSTEM WHEN THEY ENGAGE TOO EASILY. IVE INSPECTED THE BRAKES AND NOTICED NOTHING WRONG.
